name: Wishes Unnumbered
description: After your Raiden Shogun, who has this card equipped, uses Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu, it will deal +1 additional DMG for every point of Resolve consumed.
descriptionraw: After your $[A1407], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S14073]</color>, it will deal +1 additional DMG for every point of Resolve consumed.
descriptionreplaced: After your Raiden Shogun, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color>, it will deal +1 additional DMG for every point of Resolve consumed.
